attributes.action: Stop Polish abusing our benefit system
attributes.additional_details: We do not have the funds to care for our own citizens, yet British taxpayers are funding child benefit payments for 37,900 children who live in Poland, Treasury figures show. "The Telegraph 22 Sept 2012". Polish are coming into our country for pregnancy care, as we make it so easily available. They often decide to stay and whilst here can claim benefits to support any children still living in Poland. I am not a racist, but our country as become too much of a soft touch at the tax payers expense. We want our Britain  back!!!
